page.title: 06CASTLEMILK Jeely Piece Clubs
page.content:
What is a{jeely piece}?It's a Scottish expression for bread and jam : a cheap snack for kids!
So what's a{Jeely Piece Club}? Well it's a{playscheme}unique to{Castlemilk
It was started in the mid seventies by a group of mums to give their own kids something to do and to provide a baby sitting facility for working mums
Originally they had a struggle to get facilities but their persistance has meant that they now run{4 clubs}and a{ {resource centre}
Although they now have an{urban aid} grant the mums still run the clubs themselves. They are open all year,{ {8.30am}to{10pm}for all ages (including a creche)
